Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE FEDERAL STREET SUITE 150, BOSTON, Massachusetts, 02110, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Iron Mountain Inc is a record management services provider. The firm is organized as a REIT. Most of its revenue comes from its storage business, with the rest coming from value-added services. The firm primarily caters to enterprise clients in developed markets. Its business segments include Global RIM Business; Global Data Center Business; and Corporate and Other Business.
